bibl.title: Three Consular Dates.
bibl.note: 1. P. Lond. III, 1286 descr.: A Curious Combination. 24 May or 23 June 225. - 2. S.B. IV, 7444 [= P. Princ. Inv. Dep. 7548]: Date and Rent. 3 September 327. - 3. SB XX 14535 [= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 28694]: Which Basilius? A 481 date seems to be preferable to a date in 541.
145.4 P. Lond. III, 1286 descr. P. Princ. Inv. Dep. 7548 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 28694
